title: Oak Ridge, Tennessee
summary: Oak Ridge is a city in Anderson and Roane counties in the eastern part of the U.S. state of Tennessee, about 25 miles (40Â km) west of downtown Knoxville. Oak Ridge's population was 29,330 at the 2010 census.[7] It is part of the Knoxville Metropolitan Area. Oak Ridge's nicknames include the Atomic City,[8] the Secret City,[9] the Ridge, and the City Behind the Fence.[10]
